description: (Enterprise Tier Only) Commands to manage customized accelerator in Azure Spring Apps.

commands.name: az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator create
commands.summary: (Enterprise Tier Only) Create a customized accelerator.
commands.syntax:
az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator create --display-name
                                                                --git-url
                                                                --name
                                                                --resource-group
                                                                --service
                                                                [--accelerator-tags]
                                                                [--ca-cert-name]
                                                                [--description]
                                                                [--git-branch]
                                                                [--git-commit]
                                                                [--git-interval]
                                                                [--git-sub-path]
                                                                [--git-tag]
                                                                [--host-key]
                                                                [--host-key-algorithm]
                                                                [--icon-url]
                                                                [--no-wait]
                                                                [--password]
                                                                [--private-key]
                                                                [--type {Accelerator, Fragment}]
                                                                [--username]
examples: az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator create --name AcceleratorName --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup --git-url https://github.com/xxx --git-branch main --display-name acc-name

commands.name: az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator delete
commands.summary: (Enterprise Tier Only) Delete a customized accelerator.
examples: az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator delete --name AcceleratorName --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator list
commands.summary: (Enterprise Tier Only) List all existing customized accelerators.
examples: az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator list --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator show
commands.summary: (Enterprise Tier Only) Show the settings, provisioning status and runtime status of customized accelerator.
examples: az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator show --name AcceleratorName --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator sync-cert
commands.summary: (Enterprise Tier Only) Sync certificate of a customized accelerator.
examples: az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator sync-cert --name AcceleratorName --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator update
commands.summary: (Enterprise Tier Only) Update a customized accelerator.
commands.syntax:
az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator update --display-name
                                                                --git-url
                                                                --name
                                                                --resource-group
                                                                --service
                                                                [--accelerator-tags]
                                                                [--ca-cert-name]
                                                                [--description]
                                                                [--git-branch]
                                                                [--git-commit]
                                                                [--git-interval]
                                                                [--git-sub-path]
                                                                [--git-tag]
                                                                [--host-key]
                                                                [--host-key-algorithm]
                                                                [--icon-url]
                                                                [--no-wait]
                                                                [--password]
                                                                [--private-key]
                                                                [--type {Accelerator, Fragment}]
                                                                [--username]
examples: az spring application-accelerator customized-accelerator update --name AcceleratorName --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup --git-url https://github.com/xxx --git-branch main --display-name acc-name
